required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Food Effect Study of SHR1459 on Healthy Chinese Adult Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open, Single-center, Two-cycle, Double-sequence Crossover Study to Investigate the Effects of a High-fat Diet on the Pharmacokinetics of Healthy Chinese Adult Subjects After Oral Administration of SHR1459 Tablets

brief_summary.textblock:
The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the effect of high-fat diet on pharmacokinetics of healthy Chinese adult subjects after oral administration of SHR1459 tablets.
The secondary objective of the study is to evaluate the safety of single dose of SHR1459 orally in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 23 days
through study completion, an average of 23 days
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of SHR1459

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 23 days
secondary_outcome.description: Time of maximum observed concentration (Tmax) of SHR1459

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 23 days
through study completion, an average of 23 days
secondary_outcome.description: Total body clearance for extravascular administration (CL/F) of SHR1459

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 23 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with Adverse Events (AEs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 23 days
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the adverse events according to CTCAE5.0

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 23 days
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the vital signs as a criteria of safety and tolerability variables.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 23 days
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the vital signs as a criteria of safety and tolerability variables.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 23 days
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the cardiovascular system functioning as a criteria of safety and tolerability variables.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 23 days
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the physical conditions as a criteria of safety and tolerability variables.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 23 days
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the hematology, clinical chemistry and urinalysis as a criteria of safety and tolerability variables.

intervention.intervention_name: SHR1459 fasted in P1, high-fat diet in P2
intervention.description: SHR1459 administration in fasted condition in period 1, SHR1459 administration after high-fat diet in period 2

intervention.intervention_name: SHR1459 high-fat diet in P1, fasted in P2
intervention.description: SHR1459 administration after high-fat diet in period 1, SHR1459 administration in fasted condition in period 2
